Text: Heyyy can u not upload the first 3 episodes of this show??? :))

Hi 20-40,
Thanks for the encode/upload.

I will rephrase the statement asked by 'seenoeveil47' into a polite question and hope this show will catch on.

I would advise ALL, even those not interested in cosmology or physics to give this a look and get their children to watch. It is fascinating.

Please seed.

Thanks.
Jon
Lolz..!! @ 'jon4fun' i never meant to be rude in any kind..!! So Sorry tho if it seemed so...!! :)

@Jon: I rendered seenoevil's question as "would you"  even if "can you not" sounded little too "mysterious", I agree.

In short, I would encode first three episodes (in encoding right now and I'll up the torrent after Karate Kid (at approx. 20:00 CET).

But people - please do seed back. New month has started and there is no excuses for 80% of Hit&Runs at ep.4 alone. It's 111 MB for sake-of-god... I would delete such torrents, be sure about.
